tool_description: get all countries of the world
title: getCountries

api_list.name: getCountries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://getcountries.p.rapidapi.com/getcountries.p.rapidapi.com"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "getcountries.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getCountriesV2
api_list.description: get all coutries of the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://getcountries.p.rapidapi.com/v1/geo/cities"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "getcountries.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
